Episodes.Title: Incident On and Off a Mountain Road
Episodes.Plot: When Ellen's (Bree Turner) car breaks down on a deserted mountain road in the middle of nowhere, she encounters a monster-like man who is intent on killing her. Ellen will not go down without a fight and the game of cat-and-mouse soon shifts as Ellen fights back.

Episodes.Title: Dreams in the Witch House
Episodes.Plot: Walter Gilman, a college student rents a loft in a building in the New England town of Arkham. While studying interdimensional string theory at college he is haunted by nightmares of a 17th century witch and her rat with a human face. He must prevent the death of his neighbour's baby at the hands of these forces while it's possible he could become the murderer himself.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Dance of the Dead
Episodes.Plot: This story revolves around a post-apocalyptic town where re-animated corpses of friends and enemies dance on stage for the few people who survived a nuclear holocaust. Peggy a naÃ¯ve girl learns of the dangers of the outside world and the sacrifices made to guarantee her survival.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.Director: Tobe Hooper, Richard Matheson, Jessica Lowndes, Jona

Episodes.Title: Jenifer
Episodes.Plot: Jenifer is a tale of a modern-day Lolita who with her good looks and charm destroys the bodies and souls of all the men who crosses her path. Police officer Frank unfortunately saves this young girls life only to find out in this horrific twist that that no good deed goes unpunished.
Episodes.Director: Dario Argento, Bruce Jones, Carrie Fleming, Steven W

Episodes.Title: Chocolate
Episodes.Plot: Jamie, a newly divorced man who creates artificial flavours for the food industry, suddenly and inexplicably starts to experience brief and random flashes from someone - and somewhere - unknown: sight, sound, smell, touch. Learning that he's experiencing life through the senses of a mysterious woman, he begins to fall in love with her-without having met her. Eventually, he discovers a horrifying secret that binds him inexorably with the perfect woman in an erotic, horrifying dance of death.
Episodes.Director: Mick Garris, Mick Garris, Henry Thomas

Episodes.Title: Homecoming
Episodes.Plot: In this contemporary political satire, The living dead have been found tampering with the Presidential election. Fear sweeps the nation as the media uncover this chilling fact which leads to widespread panic.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Deer Woman
Episodes.Plot: In this horror comedy, A set of peculiar murders leads sceptical detective Dwight Faraday to suspect that an ancient Native American mythological creature is in fact real.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes

Episodes.Title: John Carpenter's Cigarette Burns
Episodes.Plot: In this episode Jimmy Sweetman ventures out to locate a rare film print called "Le Fin Du Monde". The film once shown has been known to drive its audience into a crazed frenzy before the theatre goes up in flames.  He finally discovers that the film does live up to it's reputation on the results are quite shocking.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Fair Haired Child
Episodes.Plot: A 13 year old is kidnapped and locked in a basement by a scary couple with their younger son. During there incarceration in the basement the two children develop a special relationship and try and get through the night.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Walter Phelan,  Jesse Hadock,  Haley Morrison,  Ian Wallace,  Lindsay Pulsipher,  William Samples,  Lori Petty

Episodes.Title: Sick Girl
Episodes.Plot: Sick Girl is a comedy thriller about an insect scientist and  the fly in the ointment that threatens her lesbian love affair.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Angela Bettis,  Jessica Hlubik,  Erin Brown,  Mike McKee,  Chandra Berg,  Marcia Bennett

Episodes.Title: Pick Me Up
Episodes.Plot: This bloody tale will give you an interesting twist to hitchhiking. Both driver and passenger have a little surprise for  the 25 year old heroine of the story
Episodes.GuestStars: Mar Andersons,  Michael Petroni,  Crystal Lowe,  Paul Anthony,  Michael Eklund,  Kristie Marsden,  Peter Benson,  Tom Pickett,  Laurene Landon,  Warren  Kole,  Michael Moriarty,  Fairuza Balk

Episodes.Title: Haeckel's Tale
Episodes.Plot: Based on Clive Barker's short story. While on his way to see his sick father, Ernest Haeckel takes shelter with an elderly man and his young wife but soon discovers their horrible secret...
Episodes.GuestStars: Christopher Delisle,  Elizabeth McQuade,  Jill Morrison,  Warren Kimmel,  Pablo Coffey,  Jon Polito,  Micki Maunsell,  Gerard Plunkett,  Tom McBeath,  Leela Savasta,  Derek Cecil,  Steve Bacic
